Articles.Content: Seriously do you think that SQUAD will implement anther planet because the older ones have gotten boring for me.

Agree. Would like the Saturn analog added.

Come back Nova!
For about how long would another planet keep your attention?
3 hours until they establish a base.

another planet would be nice but ultimately unfulfilling in the grand scheme of things.

what we need is for the campaign mode to give us missions, because sandbox mode gets boring once youve gone everywhere.
Santa Kerman will bring us something neat in December. I am pretty confident in that
I'll be happy when they give us an entire randomly generated galaxy to explore.

http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv/b/465508879

Mike "Mu" gives you a little sneak peak at 44:00mins what is lying in their Drawers. Maybe we will see his Planet in the future.

Santa Kerman will bring us something neat in December. I am pretty confident in that

Santa Kerman, can u plz send me far, far, far away from the "in-laws"

Most of moons are little boring for now. Maybe science and missions change it. There is enough celestial bodies but I think need more purposes, more secrets, maybe caves?

I have idea for a planets. Ther should be something unusual and maybe on edge of posibility:

1) Medium sized planet on litlle lower than Moho orbit. Core of planet is very hot, atmosphere is thin and semitransparent with heavy chemical gases. Volcano, river of lava, cracked shells everywere. Rain of white-hot iron splashed on surface.

2) Smaller than above planet faced one side always to the Sun. Hotter side generates fumes or have a dusty atmosphere like in above example. Opposite side is frozen with fog, clouded atmosphere with geysers or some vulcanoes

3) Almost liquid surface with a capes of ice and floes. This liqiud does not need to be water.

4) Object with unregular orbit from porous iron or group of that objects.

5) Enormous and transparent forming gas giant. Some like a cloud in space.
I would like a fire world very close to the Sun, with lava and massive fissures.

Guys, more planets is under the what not to suggest list. It's planned and it will come when the devs decide to go back to it.

In the meanwhile, if you want to suggest specific ideas and names, you can go here.

That said, thread locked.
